scripts.predeps: rm -rf tmp/deps; mkdir -p tmp/deps/client/src; mkdir tmp/deps/src; echo
scripts.deps: npm run deps:server; npm run deps:client
scripts.deps:server: babel -d tmp/deps/ index.js; babel -d tmp/deps/src src/; madge tmp/deps/*.js tmp/deps/src/* -i deps-server.png; open deps-server.png
scripts.deps:client: babel -d tmp/deps/client/src client/src; madge tmp/deps/client/src -i deps-client.png; open deps-client.png
scripts.deploy: webpack && git add client/ && git commit -m 'rebundle' && git push heroku master
